item.title: Meetups
item.description: Cloud Native Computing Johannesburg (CNCJ) 2021 Transforming into a zero-bug super developer on Kubernetes Wed, 28 July, 6:00PM Online Webinar meetup event link How to think Cloud Native for your next Data project? Wed, 14 April, 6:00PM Online Fireside Chat meetup event link 2020 If it ain't broke, rewrite it! - Inject innovation in restrictive environments Wed, 25 November, 6:00PM Online Webinar meetup event link Using Google Anthos to unlock cloud-native hybridization awesomeness Wed, 23 September, 6:00PM Online Webinar meetup event link Multi-cluster Kubernetes, the easy way [with Rancher] Wed, 29 July, 6:00PM Online Webinar meetup event link [Kubernetes] A demo of Rancher's RKE Mon, 29 June, 6:00PM Online Webinar meetup event link [Kubernetes] Embracing Failure: Lessons learned from 50 post-mortems Tues, 26 May, 6:00PM Online Webinar meetup event link Webinar - Day 2 Operations: Kubernetes Management Thurs, 26 March, 6:00PM Online Webinar meetup event link Webinar - Kubernetes Fundamentals Thurs, 13 February, 6:00PM Online Webinar meetup event link 2019 Why should you consider Kubeflow if you are thinking machine learning?
